default: Find the JAIL KEYS and get me out!

default.police chief: Noted: The Police Chief is locked in the jail cell.

get jail keys.use jail keys chief: Thanks for helping me out. You're a real top cop.
get jail keys.leave: I'll never forgive you for this!

police chief: What are you waiting for? Find the JAIL KEYS and get me out of here!
use jail keys stinky: That guy you set free is dangerous. You're a menace!
use jail keys chief: Thank you for unlocking the door. I'll rest here for a moment...
